channel.title: Viewing cases via Server
channel.description:
Hey everyone, starting to work on a project of mine (PCU) again since I have a week off and it helps me to relax yada yada. So here is what I'm stuck on, I have seen development teams have methods in their servers that allow owners to see ass the cases of things they click on client sided through a message like the game updates or through right clicking. Any help on a previous post or a method to add something like this, it's rather impossible to do major things without it.
Thanks - Andrew

item.title: Viewing cases via Server
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

No problem,
I can’t wait for the final release of PCU, I used the first release when I was leaning a longgg time ago
Well not that long, but it feel’s long… anyway, support++; for PCU.

Read full topic

item.title: Viewing cases via Server
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:404641”] if (playerRights == #) { System.out.println(playerName + " BUTTON_TYPE: " + BUTTON_TYPE_ID); sM("playerName + " BUTTON_TYPE: " + BUTTON_TYPE_ID"); } [/quote]
Thanks Extreame

Read full topic

item.title: Viewing cases via Server
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

if (playerRights == #) 
{
System.out.println(playerName + " BUTTON_TYPE: " + BUTTON_TYPE_ID);
sM("playerName + " BUTTON_TYPE: " + BUTTON_TYPE_ID");
}
